name: Mike Bodson
text: .@MikeBodson: "Regulators will need to define how new #technology fits into the regulatory framework. Given this, the more we share information & knowledge with them, the easier we can foster innovation & protect market integrity."

name: Mike Bodson
text: "Collaboration between all the various players, from the industry to regulators & others, is essential to developing integrated solutions and creating standards & strong governance. No one will solve the challenges we face alone, and we must avoid siloed solutions" @MikeBodson.

name: Mike Bodson
text: .@MikeBodson: "Innovation needs to be grounded in client value, supporting business objectives & goals. #Technology is a means to an end not the end itself. If the value proposition isn't compelling enough, clients will not adopt the innovation."
